law.catch_line: The Authority shall send a written request to the Board of Public Works for additional money if:...

text.section:
The Authority shall send a written request to the Board of Public Works for additional money if:
the Authority and the Secretary find that more money is needed to keep the reserves of the Fund at an adequate level; and
the Secretary consents to the request.
The Board of Public Works may disburse the requested amount from the General Emergency Fund.
